snippet: The Rev. John Bowe and the Rev. David Givey were found to have violated a code of behavior that includes a ban on physical contact, but they did not abuse children, the archdiocese said.
abstract: Archdiocese of Philadelphia announces that the Revs John Bowe and David Givey have been found unsuitable for ministry in an inquiry into the alleged sexual abuse of minors; the two priests are among the 26 who were placed on administrative leave after a 2011 grand jury report found that several dozen priests accused of abuse were still in active ministry.
lead_paragraph: The Rev. John Bowe and the Rev. David Givey were found to have violated a code of behavior that includes a ban on physical contact, but they did not abuse children, the archdiocese said.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Archdiocese Bars Two More Priests From Ministry
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Archdiocese Bars Two More Priests From Ministry
